section.title: Example
section.source: <mak:list from="best.Student s, s.person p" where="p.gender=\"male\"" orderBy="p.name"> <mak:value expr="p.name"/> <mak:value expr="p.surname"/> <mak:value expr="p.birthdate" var="birth" printVar="printBirth"/> <% // we only print the birthdate if it's after some date if ( ((java.util.Date)birth).after(new java.util.Date(1980, 0, 1)) ) { out.print(printBirth); } %> <mak:value expr="s.person.favoriteQuote" maxLength="60" addTitle="auto" /> </mak:list>
